Eye-popping athletic lines aren't what you'd normally expect from a practical hatchback. But that's exactly what you get with the Lancer Sportback Ralliart – head turning style with the kind of versatility your active life demands.

Add a 2.0L turbocharged inline-4 DOHC engine purring under the hood capable of 237 HP and 253 lb.-ft of torque. And then throw in the fuel-efficient advanced 6-speed automated manual transmission for lightning-fast, racing-calibre shifts. That's when the fun really begins.

Life is ever changing, but that doesn't mean your taste in cars has to change with it. Looks. Power. And yes, versatility. What else would you call 1,320L (46.6 cu. ft.) of cargo space? That's enough room to tackle a weekend camping trip or a crib just waiting to be assembled. Turn on the available 710-watt Rockford Fosgate® high performance CD/MP3 player with 9-speakers and a 10-inch dual-voice coil subwoofer, and the only compromise you'll have to make is who's song you're going to listen to next.

general_desc:
An outstanding gene pool delivers
the sportiest C-Class ever.
What do you get when you marry a 40-year auto racing heritage to a V-8 engine designed with thoroughbred motor sports technology? Consummate performance, as evidenced by the C 63 AMG. A vehicle that moves to the pole position in its segment in terms of both sheer driving enjoyment and expressive design.

With its wide, road hugging stance and ultra-dynamic exterior featuring a distinctive front end with powerfully contoured flared apron and wings, the C 63 will be impressive at first glance. A closer look reveals even more dramatic design flourishes, including bonnet with striking powerdomes, rear apron with black diffusor insert and high-gloss chrome-lated twin tailpipes.

But its real beauty lies within. The prominent powerdomes conceal a powerful AMG 6.2-litre V-8 engine that has 451 hp and maximum torque of 443 lb-ft, allowing you to accelerate from 0 to 100 km/h in just 4.5 seconds.

More practical in everyday use than any of its rivals, the C 63 AMG adds up to a unique proposition. A dynamic interior with sports seats and a performance steering wheel, complemented by an engine and exterior details, are a compelling testament to power, performance and an uncompromising will to win.

Whatever the C 63 AMG promises at first glance, it more than lives up to expectations once on the road.

But if you’re still craving more, the optional AMG Performance Package Plus will leave those expectations in a trail of dust. With a 30 hp boost in engine power for a total 481 hp, the C 63’s top speed is increased to 280 km/h.  A Carbon Fibre AMG trunk lid spoiler and red brake calipers add even more visual presence to an already stunning package.
